comment: Great at being clear with what you need to know for the exams & doesn't waste time with things you don't need to know. He is very helpful and cares about your success. He ensures that every student understands the material before leaving lab & gives you plenty of materials and tips to review for exams. Great graduate teaching assistant!

I really liked his teaching style and giving us ways to remember things. That part helped me out a lot. He also gave lots of tips and tricks specifically for the exams which helped a ton! Just make sure you're studying and participating during lab and you'll be good.

I recommend taking another professor. He doesn't know what he is teaching. He tries to make remarks to be funny but it's just not ok to say to your students. You basically have to teach yourself because he doesn't know anything about this subject.
